title: Reflections of the Mind
premise: A telepathic signal begins influencing the crew’s dreams.

title: Echos from the Neutral Zone
premise: A derelict Romulan ship transmits a distress beacon decades old.

title: Pathogen
premise: A bio-engineered virus spreads through the Enterprise at warp.

title: Resonance
premise: A subspace harmonic begins destabilizing the warp core.

title: Whispers
premise: An uncharted nebula carries voices mimicking the crew.

title: The Gate
premise: An ancient structure on Acheron IV opens portals to parallel realities.

title: Sanctuary
premise: A lost colony requests asylum from unknown pursuers.

title: Temporal Echo
premise: The Enterprise begins reliving its own past missions in real time.

title: Sky Born
premise: An energy-based lifeform bonds with the ship’s deflector system.

title: For Honor
premise: A Klingon commander challenges Worf’s loyalty to Starfleet.

title: The Silence of the Sky
premise: A star system suddenly loses all electromagnetic emissions.

title: The Veil of Perfection
premise: A utopian civilization hides a devastating secret beneath the surface.

title: Ambush
premise: A Nausicaan raiding party traps the Enterprise in an ion storm.

title: Signal at Solitude Point
premise: A faint Starfleet distress call leads the Enterprise into a subspace rift.
